books.author: Neil Shooter
books.description: Two scientists on a journey to the edge of the Solar System are determined to push the boundaries of modern astronomy.
books.title: The Edge

books.author: Matthew Quirk
books.description: To find a Russian mole in the White House, an FBI agent must question everything. . . and trust no one...
books.title: The Night Agent

books.author: Joel  Harris
books.description: To live in a world of shadows and ash is to know a horrific existence. One of Pain, blood, and sickness.
books.title: The Crucifix Dagger

books.author: Madeleine D'Este
books.title: The Antics of Evangeline: Collection 1: Mystery and Mayhem in steampunk Melbourne

books.author: Martin Scott
books.description: It's not been a good morning for Thraxas. A vindictive judge has just fined him every guran he has, and two old enemies have threatened his life. And to cap it all, the rainy season has started and it's as wet as a mermaid's blanket in the magical city of Turai.
books.title: Thraxas at the Races

books.author: Renni Browne
books.title: Self-Editing for Fiction Writers: How to Edit Yourself Into Print

books.author: Christopher McDougall
books.title: Natural Born Heroes: The lost secrets of strength and endurance

books.author: Mark Timmony
books.description: Mark Timmony's debut epic fantasy novel about two brothers, a prophesy and a world on the edge of destruction.
books.title: The Blood of the Spear

books.author: Michael E. Shea
books.title: Return of the Lazy Dungeon Master

books.author: Martin Scott
books.description: In the scorching heat of the Turanian summer, Thraxas is doing his best to avoid working. His plans for a spell of uninterrupted beer drinking go wrong when the Civil Guards arrest a man for murder, right in Thraxas's office.
books.title: Thraxas and the Warrior Monks

books.author: Martin Scott
books.description: Thraxas sails to the Elvish Island of Avula to escape the harsh Turanian winter, and escape from Makri, who's recent behaviour has outraged all decent citizens.
books.title: Thraxas and Elvish Isles

books.author: Mick Herron
books.description: In the Intelligence Service purgatory that is Slough House, where spies mockingly called the slow horses are sent to finish what is left of their careers, their boss Jackson Lamb is on his way Oxford. A former spook has turned up dead on a bus.
books.title: Dead Lions

books.author: R.A. Salvatore
books.series: Forgotten Realms: The Dark Elf Trilogy, #1; Legend of Drizzt,
books.title: Homeland

books.author: Jonathan Fesmire
books.title: Bodacious Creed: a Steampunk Zombie Western

books.author: Rayne Hall
books.title: Writing Vivid Settings: Professional Techniques for Fiction Authors

books.author: Martin Scott
books.description: Princess Du-Akai, third in line to the throne, hires Thraxas to retrieve a missing letter.
books.title: Thraxas

books.author: Matt Gemmell
books.title: Once Upon A Time — Volume 1: An Anthology of Flash Fiction

books.author: Jean M. Auel
books.title: The Clan of the Cave Bear

books.author: Rayne Hall
books.title: Fantasy Writing Prompts: 77 Powerful Ideas To Inspire Your Fiction

books.author: Rayne Hall
books.title: Writing Short Stories to Promote Your Novels

books.author: Marion Zimmer Bradley
books.description: The tumult and adventures of Camelot's court through the eyes of the women who bolstered the king's rise and schemed for his fall.
books.title: The Mists of Avalon

books.description: With the city still gripped by a fierce winter, the only thing Thraxas wants to do is drink beer in front of a roaring fire.
books.author: Martin Scott
books.title: Thraxas and the Sorcerers

books.description: Thraxas investigates a missing artefact at the behest of the head of the sorceror's guild.
books.author: Martin Scott
books.title: Thraxas and the Dance of Death
